content: पांचाल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ली|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Belonging to or ruling over the Pañcālas. --लः {@--1@} The country of the Pañcālas. {@--2@} A prince of the Pañcālas --लाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) {@--1@} The people of the Pañcālas. {@--2@} An association of five guilds ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} of a car penter, weaver, barber, washerman, and shoe-maker).
